actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Joint resolution relative to the determination of the fate of POWs and MIAs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President and the Secretary of State, who was the United States representative at the Paris peace talks, take the necessary steps, including renegotiation if this is deemed necessary, to get an honorable determination of the fate of all United States servicemen and civilians missing in Southeast Asia.

titles.title: Joint resolution relative to the determination of the fate of POWs and MIAs.
